meanings.sent1: She retranslated the document to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The book was retranslated into multiple languages for a wider audience.
meanings.sent3: He retranslated the joke, but it still didn't make sense.
meanings.sent4: The melody was retranslated into a beautiful symphony.
meanings.sent5: The ancient text was retranslated with modern language for better understanding.

meanings.definition: To render in a different language or form
meanings.sent1: The poem was retranslated into Spanish for the poetry contest.
meanings.sent2: The software was retranslated to be compatible with the new operating system.
meanings.sent3: She retranslated the recipe into a song for fun.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were retranslated into a painting of vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The story was retranslated into a graphic novel for visual appeal.

meanings.sent1: The therapist retranslated his dreams to uncover hidden meanings.
meanings.sent2: The historian retranslated the ancient text to reveal new insights.
meanings.sent3: She retranslated his words, but the message remained unclear.
meanings.sent4: His silence was retranslated as a sign of deep contemplation.
meanings.sent5: The artist retranslated the painting to convey a different emotion.
